::Spears::

She stopped dead in her tracks and glared at Lunarpine. "Get out of 
my way. I'm not going to be turned into scrap. Now Move!" She fired 
her optic lazar right at his feet.  It missed within inches.  She 
then ran out, away from him and Firearm. "I'm not letting you cut me 
up."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> 
> 
> (Last I knew they were going to Lunarpines Transport Pod. I copy 
and pasted
> parts from other messages so everyone will understand.)
> 
> "Is it just me or does she look like she's 
malfunctioning?"  ::Firearm asks
> to
> Lunarpine,
> 
> Lunarpine glares at Spears, not bothering to make eye contact with 
Firearm,
> "I don't think this is a normal malfunction, I think the chips are 
still
> messing with her head." He'd known Spears long enough to tell 
something
> wasn't right, more than likely the chip had everything to do with 
it.
> 
> Lunarpine transforms to wolf mode and cuts off Spears escape, he 
transforms
> back to robot and draws his claws. "OK Spear, you want that chip 
removed now
> or later?"
